author: AFFiNE
description: Create professional one-pagers effortlessly with our customizable AFFiNE template. Perfect for project summaries, proposals, and profiles. Organize key points, details, and contact info in a clear, concise format. Boost your productivity with this versatile, easy-to-use template designed for AFFiNE's AI-powered note-taking platform.
md:
## To use this template in AFFiNE: Create a new document in AFFiNE. Copy and paste this Markdown template into the document. Replace the placeholder text (enclosed in square brackets) with your actual content. Customize the sections, headings, and points to fit your specific needs. Use AFFiNE's formatting options to enhance the visual appeal and readability. This one-pager template is designed to: ### Capture attention with a clear title and brief overview. Highlight key points upfront. Provide space for more detailed information in separate sections. Include contact information for follow-up. Offer additional resources for those who want to learn more. ### You can further customize this template in AFFiNE by: Using different heading levels to adjust the visual hierarchy. Adding images or icons to make it more visually appealing. Incorporating callout boxes for important information. Using color coding or tags to categorize different types of information. Adding links to relevant AFFiNE documents or external resources. Remember, the key to a good one-pager is keeping it concise and focused on the most important information. The goal is to communicate your main points quickly and effectively. |Title| |---| |[](LinkedPage:mhXkUvwacMxFPXrxlUQEF)

title: One Pager Template
